name: OldMacDonald'sFarmandAnimals
0:
”alexa open old macdonald farm”
”visit farm”
”play games”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: old macdonald farm
des:
Old MacDonald's farm - Awesome fun experience and learning for kids.
The skill takes the kids through different farm animals from old macdonald's farm like cow, sheep, pig hen etc.,
It provide useful information and interesting facts about animals with amazing sound effects..
You also play different interesting games like pickaboo, counting game and letter game.
The skill provides points in terms of rewards to kids to make it more interesting.

Instructions:
----------------
alexa open old macdonald farm
visit farm
play games
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
